name: Electro Magnate Demo
description:
Demo version of incremental/idle/clicker game about generation and selling electrical power.

The demo has a limit of 1000$ on the balance and has limit the purchase of some units on the market.

Full version can be purchased on My.Games:

https://1l-go.my.games/r/adid/3371978_1/sub/itch.io/pid/117899/pof/1/f/1/

Known issues:
  • if you have problem with mouse cursor - switch to windowed mode by alt+enter
